titles.title: The Spirit of the Lord is upon Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v1 v4 v5 v6 v7 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Spirit of the Lord is upon Me
He has anointed Me
To preach the gospel to the poor

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted
And to the captives and prisoners
Proclaim their liberty

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And to the blind, recovery of sight
And those who are oppressed
To set them free
This is the year of the favor of the Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted
And to the captives and prisoners
Proclaim their liberty

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And to the blind, recovery of sight
And those who are oppressed
To set them free
This is the year of the favor of the Lord
This is the year of the favor of the Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come to Me all who are weary
Come you heavy laden
Come and I will give you rest

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Take My yoke upon you
Learn from Me
For I am gentle and humble
And you shall find rest for your souls
